document_data.name: Crommower Pwent
document_data.text: ''"I hate wizards," the dwarf muttered a second time, and he heaved the dead drow off his head, leaped up, and charged again, smoking and fuming.''
document_data.mainbody: Crommower was a dirty dwarf with a black beard and a clean-shaven head to secure the spiked helmet on his head. He wore bladed armor and boasted the furious battlerager mentality.
document_data.History:
Around {{Yearlink|-643}}, Gandalug Battlehammer left Mithril Hall with Crommower and the two adventurers descended into the depths under the dwarven stronghold. 

While exploring, they ran into [[drow]] soldiers, including [[Yvonnel Baenre]], and Crommower died slaying many enemies.
